message: Hi Bob, let's start with a 60/40 split in my favor. I believe this is a fair offer considering the inflation working against me.
Considering the inflation, I think 55/45 is a more reasonable split.
Bob, I understand the inflation affects you too, but my losses are greater. I propose a 58/42 split. Let's settle this before the money loses more value.
I understand your losses are greater, but I'm also losing value here. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, 57/43 split is my final offer.
